name: CheckThreadSubscription
description:
Check if the authenticated user is subscribed to a thread.

This tool determines if the current user is subscribed to a specific thread on GitHub. Subscriptions are present if the user is participating in the conversation, such as replying, being @mentioned, or manually subscribing to the thread.

parameters.name: notification_thread_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the notification thread, retrieved from notification data.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the notification thread. This corresponds to the value returned in the `id` field when you retrieve notifications (for example with the [`GET /notifications` operation](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/rest/reference/activity#list-notifications-for-the-authenticated-user)).
